products.name: Aloe Vera
products.description: Aloe Vera is a succulent plant known for its medicinal properties and easy care. It's perfect for sunny windowsills and helps purify the air.

products.name: Snake Plant
products.description: Snake Plant, also known as Sansevieria, is a hardy indoor plant that thrives on neglect. It's excellent for beginners and helps improve indoor air quality.

products.name: Bonsai Tree
products.description: Bonsai Tree is a miniature tree that brings a touch of zen to your home. It requires careful pruning and shaping to maintain its form.

products.name: Spider Plant
products.description: Spider Plant is an easy-to-grow houseplant with arching leaves and small white flowers. It's known for its ability to clean the air of pollutants.

products.name: Peace Lily
products.description: Peace Lily is a beautiful plant with glossy leaves and white spathes. It's known for its ability to thrive in low light and remove toxins from the air.

products.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
products.description: Fiddle Leaf Fig is a trendy indoor plant with large, violin-shaped leaves. It requires bright, indirect light and regular watering to thrive.

products.name: Succulent Mix
products.description: Succulent Mix is a collection of various easy-care succulents. They are perfect for sunny spots and require minimal watering.

products.name: Orchid
products.description: Orchids are elegant plants known for their stunning and long-lasting blooms. They require specific care, including humidity and indirect light.

products.name: Herb Garden Kit
products.description: Herb Garden Kit includes everything you need to grow fresh herbs at home. It's perfect for kitchens and provides a fresh supply of herbs for cooking.

products.name: ZZ Plant
products.description: ZZ Plant is a low-maintenance houseplant known for its glossy, dark green leaves. It thrives in low light and requires minimal watering.
